title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: The statistic shows the travelers of U.S. developers who in 2015 , broken down had items .
According to the survey findings , the majority of responding U.S. developers were between Credit_card to Smartphone old , while 8 % were in their 40s .
gold: The statistic shows the share of U.S. survey respondents who have had items with sensitive information lost or stolen , while traveling.
10 percent of respondents have lost or had a smartphone stolen whilst traveling .
